name: How Fast Are You! (ANDROID)
description:
A game all about speed.

This game will not be kind to you, it will only get harder as the score is going up.
Be very carefull as all the buttons are very similar and it can be tricky.
Achiving a high score or even maintaining your score can become a challenge!

If you kind you can please support me by donating, any amount is perfect <3

Thanks
